t.syntaxHelp: The correct syntax is `$tr <2 letter language code> <text>` Example: `$tr ru Hello, asshat!`.

servertime.syntaxHelp: The correct command is `$servertime (displays current server time) or $servertime <days> <hours> <minutes> (calculates what time it will be on the server after a certain period of time, calculated from your own timezone)`. Example: `$gmtcalc 1 day 2 hours 11 minutes`.
servertime.gmtOffsetNotSet: Server GMT offset is not set. Please set your server's GMT offset by running $servertime offset <number>. Example: $servertime offset -8 or $servertime offset +4
servertime.incorrectOffset: Incorrect offset. Correct syntax: $servertime offset -4 or $servertime offset +11
